I should also add that on my environment this is 100% reproducible whenever a an attempt is made to show a tooltip popup.

What version of Mozilla/XULRunner do you have installed?

I assume Mozilla 1.8.x ...

Unfortunately I am not in front of the machine right now, but I believe you may be right... however it is worth pointing out that I am not having this problem with M4, or M5, only with the 0330 integration build.

I was having massive problems with Bug 132510 on M5, which is why I was trying the nightly... that one at least has been resolved ;-)

Just for fun, can you try replacing the eclipse executable in M6 with the one from your M5?  The executable now looks around for a gre more actively than it used to, and I think it may be finding a mozilla >= 1.8 that no longer has nsIDocShell.

Also, with the correct M6 executable restored, can you try explicitly setting the MOZILLA_FIVE_HOME environment variable to point to a mozilla < 1.8 to verify that this makes M6 work for you?

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 133304 ***
